forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. ENE winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 56F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 45F. N winds shifting to ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with overcast skies late. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 47F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High around 55F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.
